source:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_00<tab>The Vath keeneye stares off into the distance, his unwavering gaze set upon Mourn.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
ヴァスの塚のサーチャーは、何やら心配しているようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_01<tab>Mourn has been overrun by pesky dinosaurs, and the Adventurers' Guild is asked to find a way to reduce their numbers. Deciding it to be the safest course of action, the Vath keeneye sends the Vath braveheart to steal their eggs. What was to be a quick job has resulted in the braveheart disappearing for days and now the keeneye needs someone to find─and possibly rescue─his friend. Travel to the caverns of Mourn and look for the braveheart.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには
「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラス・ジョブでのみ進行できます。

サーチャーによると、不浄の三塔からの依頼で、モーン大岩窟へ向かった「オソレシラズ」の戻りが遅いという。心配した彼から、様子を見にいくよう頼まれた。モーン大岩窟で「オソレシラズ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_02<tab>You speak with the Vath braveheart, who is paralyzed with fear but adamant about seeing his duties through. Search Mourn for a tyrannosaur egg and deliver it to the braveheart.
target: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_02<tab>オソレシラズと話した。どうやら、彼はドラゴンの眷属を恐れて立ち往生していたようだ。オソレシラズに、<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>を運んでくるよう頼まれた。モーン大岩窟で「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>」を持ち上げよう。

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_03<tab>You pick up one of the tyrannosaur eggs. Deliver it to the Vath braveheart.
target: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>を持ち上げた。モーン大岩窟の「オソレシラズ」に「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>」を届けよう。

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_04<tab>In his panic the Vath braveheart forgot to tell you that he must take back two tyrannosaur eggs. He would like for you to bring him another. Search Mourn for a second egg.
target: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_04<tab>オソレシラズに<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>を届けた。彼に、もうひとつ<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>を運んでくるよう頼まれた。モーン大岩窟で「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>」を持ち上げよう。

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_05<tab>Your last trek through the caves seems to have given you a good idea on where to find the dinosaur eggs and you are quick to locate another one. Pick it up and deliver it to the Vath braveheart.
target: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_05<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>を持ち上げた。モーン大岩窟の「オソレシラズ」に「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>」を届けよう。

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_06<tab>The Vath braveheart is very upset that the Vath keeneye did not disclose to him all the necessary details before having him embark upon this mission. In a trembling voice, he claims that he will be staying behind in the caverns of Mourn with the beasts he so fears as a form of protest.
target: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_06<tab>オソレシラズに<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>を届けた。彼は、サーチャーが現場をわかってないと不満を漏らしていた。ヴァスの塚の「サーチャー」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_07<tab>The Vath keeneye is stunned and insulted to learn that the Vath braveheart believes him to be unworthy of managing their Adventurers' Guild. He shakes his head and tells you that running an organization is a great deal more difficult than he had ever expected it to be.
target: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEQ_07<tab>サーチャーに報告した。彼は、現場の不満を知りギルド運営の難しさを思い知るが、オソレシラズは「ビビリ」「ヘタレ」「ハジシラズ」などに改名すべきと言い放つのだった。

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the egg to the Vath braveheart.
target: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>をオソレシラズに届ける

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the egg to the Vath braveheart.
target: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_TODO_04<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>をオソレシラズに届ける

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEARCHER_000_000<tab>We are very concerned, adventurer. <click> <click> The Anyx Trine dragons say the tyrannosaurs have become pests as of late. To cull their numbers, we would steal some of their eggs. We sent the braveheart on this mission.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEARCHER_000_000<tab>シシシシシ……ヒトの冒険者よ、よく来てくれた。
不浄の三塔のドラゴン族から、モーン大岩窟に棲息する、
下級眷属を間引くように依頼されてな。

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEARCHER_000_001<tab>He was supposed to snatch the tyrannosaur eggs from the caverns of Mourn and bring them back to us. However, he has been gone for many days.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEARCHER_000_001<tab>どうやら邪竜の眷属たちが、兵として用いるために呼び寄せた、
古代獣ティラノサウルスが想定以上に繁殖してしまったらしい。
だとすれば、卵を奪えばいいと考えたのだが……

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEARCHER_000_002<tab>We cannot help but fear the worst. We did not think it to be so arduous a task, but maybe Mourn is fraught with more dangers than we had anticipated.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEARCHER_000_002<tab>依頼を任せた「オソレシラズ」という同胞が戻って来ないのだ。
何かよからぬことが、あったのかもしれん。

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEARCHER_000_003<tab><click> <click> Please, can you go and make sure no ill has befallen our brother?
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEARCHER_000_003<tab>すまんが、ヒトの冒険者よ、モーン大岩窟へと向かい、
「オソレシラズ」の様子を見てきてはくれんか？

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_010<tab>Oh, we are very scared. <click> <click> This place is so scary. We were sent to steal eggs. To only steal eggs. But we are surrounded by such hideous beasts, and we do not know how to fight.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_010<tab>シシシシシ……怖い、怖いぞ。
まったく、卵を奪うのも、充分危険だよ……。

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_011<tab>A fleshling? What is it doing here? <click> <click> You have come to help us? Oh, thank you, great savior! We are grateful! We must get eggs, but we are terrified. Can you please go and steal a dinosaur egg for us?
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_011<tab>あれ……ヒトの冒険者じゃないか。
協力しに来てくれたんだね、助かるよ。
「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>」を運んで、僕に渡してくれないか？

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_015<tab>Oh, we are very glad another adventurer came to help us! There are too many of them. Too many dinosaurs for us to face alone!
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_015<tab>「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>」を運んで、僕に渡してくれないか？
恐竜に見つからないよう、気をつけてね。

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_020<tab>Er... We are sorry. <click> <click> We forgot to mention that we must take back two eggs. Please, kind hunter, bring us another.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_020<tab>シシシシシ……どうもありがとう！
ゴメン、もうひとつだけ……
「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>」を運んできてくれないか？

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_025<tab>Once we retrieve our second egg, we can return. We hope <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> makes haste.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_025<tab>シシシシシ……ゴメン、もうひとつだけ、
「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FA601 /var>」を運んできてくれないか？

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_030<tab>You have brought us another one! You are so swift and smart and brave! You are a master adventurer─much unlike the keeneye.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_030<tab>シシシシシ……どうもありがとう！
さすがは、腕利きの冒険者だね、格が違うや。

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_031<tab>He told us to go and steal eggs. He did not tell us that we must steal them from such ferocious beasts! We are very displeased. The keeneye is not the keeneye─he is...he is the Vath dulleye!
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_031<tab>それにしても、サーチャーのヤツめ……
カウンターの中から僕らに指示を出すだけで、
まったく現場をわかってないと思わないか？

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_032<tab>We will stay behind as a means of protest. Y-Yes, we are protesting his inadequate leadership. <click> <click> I-It is not that we are too afraid to move. We just refuse to take any more jobs from him today.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_032<tab>抗議の意味も込めて、しばらくここでサボってやるんだ。
「サーチャー」にも、僕の不満を伝えてくれよ。
け、けっして、恐れをなして、すくんで動けないわけじゃないぞ？

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_035<tab>Adventuring is not all it is cracked up to be. It is riskier business than we thought. Though, much and more of this risk can be attributed to the keeneye not doing his job properly!
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_BIBIRI_000_035<tab>抗議の意味も込めて、しばらくここでサボってやるんだ。
「サーチャー」にも、僕の不満を伝えてくれよ。
け、けっして、恐れをなして、すくんで動けないわけじゃないぞ？

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEARCHER_000_040<tab>We are glad to know the braveheart is safe, but to think that he called us an inadequate leader! And now he is protesting!? <click> <click> Running a guild is difficult work.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEARCHER_000_040<tab>シシシシシ……ご苦労だったな。
ほう、「オソレシラズ」が私のことを現場知らずと、
抗議しているというのか……なるほど、ギルド運営とは難しいな。

source: TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEARCHER_000_041<tab>We sent him to gather eggs because it seemed much safer than sending him to <var 1A 02 /var>slay<var 1A 01 /var> the troublesome dinosaurs. If he found this task to be too scary, then maybe the braveheart should change his name. He can be the Vath trembler or the Vath panicker. They are both much more fitting, we think.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA605_02280_SEARCHER_000_041<tab>古代獣と直接戦うよりは、安全だろうと思ったのだが……。
それはともかく「オソレシラズ」は、そろそろ改名すべきだな。
「ビビリ」「ヘタレ」「ハジシラズ」などにな……シシシシシ。
